unnormalised: Skill assessments are vital tools for accurate recruitment. Ensuring assessments align with job requirements, particularly in specialized roles like those at IIT Madras or ISRO, is paramount. A candidate's performance on these assessments can be a better indicator than relying solely on resumes. They are also crucial for internal talent mapping and promotions. Consider timed assessments, especially when considering roles with tight deadlines. Also, for positions dealing with customer support, assess soft skills. For example, for the Onam season, recruitment for customer support roles will be higher. An assessment can also determine which candidates excel at specific dishes like biryani, which might be relevant for a restaurant role!
